description:
grex is a library as well as a command-line utility that is meant to simplify the often complicated and tedious task of creating regular expressions.
It does so by automatically generating a single regular expression from user-provided test cases.
The resulting expression is guaranteed to match the test cases which it was generated from.
summary: grex – A command-line tool and library for generating regular expressions from user-provided test cases
author: Peter M. Stahl,  grex Committers
